title: Chhandamtu tak a hnai ta e
lyrics:
Chhandamtu tak a hnai ta e,
Lal Isua duhawm ber kha;
Thinlung ngui lawm nan a sawi e,
A aw nem chu ngaithla la.

Seraf zinga hla tha ber,
Thi thei lei hming lam thang ber;
Hei hi chatuan hla mawi ber,
Isua Krista hming hi.

I sual zawng zawng ngaihdam a ni,
A tih che hi ngaithla la;
I van kawng muang takin zawh teh,
Lallukhum i khum ang a.

Thihnaa tho leh ropui chu,
Amah ngei a rin tlak a;
Kan Tlantu i ngaihlu ang u,
A hming zah fo kan tum kha.

Aman kan thiam lohna a tleng,
Lal Isua hming hlu chauh khan;
Ka thinlungin hriat a duh e,
Hria se, a fak zo thei nang!

A pui a pang, a lian a te,
Lal Isua hmangaih hriaten,
Rawngbawla sawmna hi lawm se,
An nunna an hlan ngei ang.

Tin, he khawvel atang hianin,
Lalpa hnenah kan kal ang;
Hmangaih lalthutthleng din hualin,
A hming kan fak lehzual ang.
